Literature.Title: N-terminal fatty acid substitution increases the leishmanicidal activity of CA(1-7)M(2-9), a cecropin-melittin hybrid peptide
Literature.Author: Chicharro C, Granata C, Lozano R, Andreu D, Rivas L

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Leishmania sp. (promastigote)(LD50=20.4µM),Leishmania sp. (amastigote)(LD50=32.5µM),Micrococcus luteus ATCC 15307(LD50=>50µM),Escherichia coli ML-35(LD50=>50µM)
